name: Ratatouille Sandwich
author: Maren001
summary: A healthier vegetarian sandwich great at lunch or after work or school.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat a panini press according to manufacturer's instructions
Grill red bell pepper slices in the panini press on high heat until soft, about 5 minutes
Place chopped tomato and garlic in the blender
Blend with bell pepper until a smooth sauce forms, about 2 minutes
Season sauce with oregano, salt, and black pepper
Grill eggplant, zucchini, tomato, and onion slices in the panini press until softened, about 3 minutes per side
Drizzle olive oil over bread slices; flip and spread with a generous amount of sauce
Place 2 slices bread, oil-side down, on the panini press; add 1 slice of mozzarella cheese
Top with eggplant mixture and second slice of mozzarella cheese
Place second slice of bread, oil-side up, on top
Grill on medium-high until golden and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
